details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.9 XMP Package - Conforms to XMP Specification.
details.description: The metadata stream shall conform to XMP Specification and well formed PDFAExtension Schema for all extensions

rule.description: The metadata stream shall conform to XMP Specification and well formed PDFAExtension Schema for all extensions
